name: Archer Exam
description:
ARCHER EXAM

This is the top-down action game, where you are taking part in the archer exam!

We use a free assets:
"Pixel Art Top Down - Basic" 

Bug Fixes:

  • (v0.2) Cooldown, Menu and Level fixes
  • (v0.1.1) Hotfix: Bow and Arrows fixes
    • Decrease cooldown;
    • Fixed cooldown counter;
    • Now you can't hit level targets from the main-lobby island;
    • Portals destroy arrows;
    • ESC key opens MainMenu
